title: UMass Chan Medicine Grand Rounds
description: UMass Chan Medical School Department of Medicine Grand Rounds are held every Thursday at noon on the main campus of UMass Chan. UMass Chan Medicine Grand Rounds archives are available for viewing when authorized by our speakers.
cleaned_text: Archives To watch a recording: Click the topic below then press the play button (found on the bottom left of your screen). 2023 September 7 - [Grand Rounds: Can Digital Health Save the American Healthcare System?](https://www.dropbox.com/s/zzm3nrw7kxuwzrk/Med%20Grand%20Rounds%209.7.23.mp4?dl=0) June 15 - Graduation Grand Rounds Ceremony - No Recording Available June 8 - [Grander Rounds: Quality Improvement and Patient Safety Best Practices ](https://www.dropbox.com/s/rtnrglwv4tpf8jd/Med%20Grander%20Rounds%206.8.23.mp4?dl=0) June 1 - [Grand Rounds: Communicating with Patients About Vaccination: What Works to Increase Uptake? ](https://www.dropbox.com/s/dez62ourv0w15rx/Med%20Grand%20Rounds%206.1.23.mp4?dl=0) May 25 - No Grand Rounds - Resident and Fellow Poster Day May 18 - [Grand Rounds: Raising the Bar in the Management of Inflammatory Bowel Disease: Treating a Global Problem One Patient at a Time](https://www.dropbox.com/s/twv2x4bgigujvz5/Med%20Grand%20Rounds%205.18.23.mp4?dl=0) May 11 - [Grand Rounds: Malaria in Pregnancy: From a Fetal Point of View](https://www.dropbox.com/s/faholtve4rshss2/Med%20Grand%20Rounds%205.11.23.mp4?dl=0) May 4 - [Grand Rounds: Things We Do for No Reason](https://www.dropbox.com/s/p6pkwhc06esk0k5/Med%20Grand%20Rounds%205.4.23.mp4?dl=0) April 27 - Grand Rounds: Lung Nodule Diagnosis and Surgical Treatments for Lung Cancer: Advances in Robotics - Recording Not Permissible April 13 - Grand Rounds: Family Caregiver Burden and Distress in the Care of an Older Adult Living with Dementia - Recording Not Permissible April 6 - [Special Grand Rounds: Howe Lecture - The Dog Has Finally Caught the Car, Now What?
